text: Gabriel Agbonlahor (born 13 October 1986) is an English retired footballer. He last played for Aston Villa. He is of Nigerian and Scottish descent through his grandparents. == Club career == Gabriel Agbonlahor's professional football career started in 2005. He played his first game for Watford on loan from Aston Villa. This means that he was still an Aston Villa player, but he was allowed to play for Watford to get experience. He then played for Sheffield Wednesday, again on loan. At 19 years old, he played his first English Premier League game in 2006 for Aston Villa. He started the match and scored a goal, although Villa lost 4-1 against Everton F.C. == International career == Gabriel Agbonlahor played 16 games for the England Under 21 team. He also played 3 games for the England national football team in 2008 and 2009. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Watford (loan) 2005–06 2 0 0 0 0 0 – 2 0 Sheffield Wednesday (loan) 2005–06 8 0 0 0 0 0 – 8 0 Aston Villa 2005–06 9 1 0 0 0 0 – 9 1 Aston Villa 2006–07 38 9 1 0 3 1 – 42 10 Aston Villa 2007–08 37 11 1 0 2 0 – 40 11 Aston Villa 2008–09 36 11 2 0 1 0 9 1 48 12 Aston Villa 2009–10 36 13 2 1 6 2 2 0 46 16 Aston Villa 2010–11 26 3 3 0 2 1 1 1 32 5 Aston Villa 2011–12 33 5 2 1 1 0 – 36 6 Aston Villa 2012–13 28 9 1 0 4 3 – 33 12 Aston Villa 2013–14 30 4 0 0 1 0 – 31 4 Aston Villa 2014–15 34 6 2 0 0 0 – 36 6 Aston Villa 2015–16 15 1 1 0 2 0 – 18 1 Aston Villa 2016–17 13 1 1 0 0 0 – 14 1 Aston Villa 2017–18 6 1 0 0 0 0 – 6 1 Aston Villa Total 341 75 16 2 22 7 12 2 391 86 Career total Career total 351 75 16 2 22 7 12 2 401 86 == References == Category:1986 births Category:Black British sportspeople Category:English footballers Category:Living people Category:Premier League players Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham Category:Watford F.C. players
